page.title: 05The Ercall Woods
page.content: The Ercall is a Woodland area which is mainly oak with a few Silver Birch trees.Since oak trees take a long time to grow Ercall Woods must have been there for hundreds of years. The leaves of the oak are lobed and grow alternately on the stem.The fruit of the oak is the acorn and when they fall from the tree they start to germinate,but many of the young trees do not survrive.The roots of the oak grow out of the ground at the base of the tree and are very long and twisted.The woodland grass is thin and spikey. Foxes,squirrels,hedgehogs,owls, rabbits and other animals and birds live in the woods but are rather shy and difficult to spot.
